import React from "react" const ActiveSession = ({ isTimerRunning, focusTime, breakTime, sessionTime, sessionType, minutesToDuration, secondsToDuration, width, }) => { if (isTimerRunning) { return ( <>

{sessionType === "Focus" ? `Focusing for ${minutesToDuration(focusTime)} minutes` : `On Break for ${minutesToDuration(breakTime)} minutes`}

{secondsToDuration(sessionTime)} remaining

) } } export default ActiveSession;
